vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ὑμν-έω,
Epic dialect ὑμνείω [Refs 8th c.BC+]; Epic dialect 3rd.pers. plural ὑμνεῦσιν [Refs]; feminine participle ὑμνεῦσα [Refs 8th c.BC+]; Aeolic dialect infinitive ὔμνην to be restored for ὑμνεῖν in [Refs 7th c.BC+]; Laconian dialect 1st pers. plural subjunctive ὑμνίωμες [Refs 5th c.BC+]: Aeolic dialect 3rd.pers. plural imperfect ὔμνην [Refs 7th c.BC+]: future ὑμνήσω [Refs 5th c.BC+]: (ὕμνος):
__I with accusative of person or thing sung of, sing of, first in [Refs 8th c.BC+], frequently in Hymni Homerici (Hymnus ad Apollinem[Refs 7th c.BC+]: also in Prose, celebrate in a hymn, commemorate, Ὦπιν [NT+5th c.BC+]; of the hymn itself, οὔτε.. μέ τις ὕμνος ὕμνησεν [Refs 5th c.BC+] the points wherein I praised our city, [Refs 5th c.BC+]:—passive, to be celebrated in hymns, of gods, [Refs 3rd c.BC+]; also Ἀργεῖοι.. τὰ πολλὰ πάντα ὑμνέαται (Ionic dialect for -ηνται) are everywhere praised, [Refs 5th c.BC+]famous, [LXX+5th c.BC+] foul songs were sung, [Refs]
__I.2 descant upon, in song or speech, ἐν κατηρεφεῖ στέγῃ.. ὑμνήσεις κακά [Refs 5th c.BC+]; τὰν ἐμὰν ὑμνεῦσαι (Doric dialect for -οῦσαι) ἀπιστοσύναν ever singing of my want of faith, [Refs 5th c.BC+]:— passive, Ἐτεοκλέης ἂν.. ὑμνοῖτο.. φροιμίοις πολυρρόθοις [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__I.3 with accusative cognate, sing, ᾆσμα, ὕμνον, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II tell over and over again, harp upon, repeat, recite, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ὡς.. [Refs]; τὸν νόμον ὑμνεῖν recite the form of the law, [Refs] —passive, ὁ δ᾽ εἶπε πρός με βαί᾽, ἀεὶ δ᾽ ὑμνούμενα ([Refs 5th c.BC+]
__III intransitive, sing, chant, ὡς ποιηταὶ ὑμνήκασι περὶ αὐτῶν [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ὑμνῶν οὔποτ᾽ ἔληγεν ὡς.. [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__III.2 in passive sense, φῆμαι.. ὑμνήσουσι περὶ τὰ ὦτα will ring in their ears, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to sing hymns, sing praisespraise
to hymn, praise, celebrate, or worship with hymns, Acts 16:25; Heb. 2:12; absolute to sing a hymn, Mt. 26:30; Mk. 14:26*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: intrans. cantar un himno ; trans. cantarle alabanzas
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) (及物動詞) 謳歌...., 向著.....謳歌
2) (不及物動詞) 唱 (一首詩歌) (太 26:30)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) (及物动词) 讴歌...., 向着.....讴歌
2) (不及物动词) 唱 (一首诗歌) (太 26:30)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: hát thánh nhạc; bài thánh ca
